home.content: Bachelor of Systems Engineering. I seek to apply theoretical and practical knowledge during my academic training.

can-do.title: What I can do?
can-do.content1: Creation of friendly and scalable web applications
can-do.content2: Creation of web applications installable on mobile devices

about.title: About me
about.content: Technology enthusiast, more specifically the idea of being able to design, program, improve and apply solutions through the use of technology. I am very interested in the why of things, discovering new things and learning on my own. For this reason, I am passionate about studying in the world of programming and software design to create innovative solutions that make people's lives easier.

activity.1: Support in updating and maintaining the website. Design of a new WordPress website model and data migration.
activity.2: Provide assistance in the University's Academic Management System. Entry and correction of data to the system.
activity.3: Equipment maintenance. Software update and review of the equipment used.
activity.4: Provide support to users. Creation of user manuals. Virtual attention on incidents. Training for platform users.

studies.title: Studies
